text: Neocolobura alboplagiata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Neocolobura. It was described by Blanchard in 1851.Biolib.cz - Neocolobura alboplagiata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1851 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Neocolobura
